channel.title: Gold!
channel.description: All i have to say is IN YOUR FACE USA! Canada takes the gold once again for hockey.

item.title: Gold!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:28, topic:331232”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=427592.msg3140798#msg3140798 date=1267490433]

^ I’m just saying that he can’t come up with bullshit answers like that.

Just because an American cares about hockey doesn’t mean that America as a country likes hockey. What were were saying is that Canada is the only country that REALLY makes a big deal about hockey.
[/quote]Is it because we’re too busy caring about McDonalds? Because last I heard stereotyping isn’t factual. :P[/quote]
McDonalds is awesome, but the average healthy American will only go to it once every month or 3 months. I haven’t been to McDonalds in almost 8 months now.

item.title: Gold!

Just because an American cares about hockey doesn’t mean that America as a country likes hockey. What were were saying is that Canada is the only country that REALLY makes a big deal about hockey.
[/quote]
Still, again, you’re wrong. What happened in 1980? Um, America made a big deal about hockey. If we won the gold medal this year, we would’ve as well.[/quote]
Still, your wrong.
Winning gold does not mean the country cares much about it…

All it means is that the athletes on the team were better then all of the others in the olympics.

item.title: Gold!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

m.dog311:

Only Canada makes a big deal about hockey…

Agreed.[quote=“Adam, post:4, topic:331232”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=427592.msg3139945#msg3139945 date=1267399313]
Only Canada makes a big deal about hockey…
[/quote]
Not true but whatever.[/quote]
Yes it is true…

[quote=“jme, post:13, topic:331232”]Absolutely amazing game. Intense as hell.

<~Tico135> FUCK USA
err
usa medals-38 canada- 27
no big deal bud

No one cares about your bronze medals. We have more golds then any other country. You also have 270 million more people to pick your athletes from.

Hockey is the only sport in the olympics worth watching.[/quote]
If you count golds as 3 points, silvers as two, and bronze as one, then we still beat you.

Everyone in your country wants to play hockey… you have more people then anyone to pick your hockey athletes from.

Hockey is the only sport in the olympics that I didn’t watch.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

It was to cold in Canada for golf, so they played it on ice.

The golf club head was to small so they made it a huge flat surface.

The ball kept rolling so they made it a cylinder.

They couldn’t make it into a small hole so they replaced it with a soccer net.

Hockey was made from fails.

Read full topic
